name: Harvest Of Love
description:
Game made in 48 hours for the DLjam 52

Check out the main site: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/harvest-of-love

Controls: you only need to click.

 - When it is only dialog: you only need to click anywhere with a mouse or your finger if you are on phone.

 - When there are reply options: click on your answer.

Beware: On a dialog without options, pass to the next dialog by clicking outside of the text area. If you click in the area where the buttons will appear in the next scene, you may accidentally click a button.
